game.name: X Burger
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to X Burger! Today is May 28th, World Burger Day. Tomorrow is May 28th. And the day after that. The celebration never ends here. Until the party is over and the 'bill' comes due. Just smile and keep working.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to X Burger! Today is May 28th, World Burger Day. Tomorrow is May 28th. And the day after that. The celebration never ends here. Until the party is over and the 'bill' comes due. Just smile and keep working.
